verses.translation: Mu by’ukuri uweza roho ye (akubaha Allah kandi agakora ibikorwa byiza) yaratsinze,
Kandi rwose uwatereranye roho ye ari mu gihombo,
Abantu ba Thamudu bahinyuye (Intumwa yabo) kubera kwigomeka,
Ubwo ubarusha ububi yahagurukanaga ibakwe (akajya kwica ingamiya y’imbyeyi),

verses.arabic_text: فَقَالَ لَهُمۡ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقۡيَٰهَا
verses.translation: Nuko Intumwa ya Allah (Swaleh) irababwira iti “Muramenye! Iyo ni ingamiya ya Allah (ntimuyigirire nabi), kandi ntimuyibuze gushoka!”

verses.arabic_text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمۡدَمَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمۡ فَسَوَّىٰهَا
verses.translation: Ariko baramuhinyuye (ya ngamiya) barayica. Nuko Nyagasani wabo arabarimbura ku bw’icyaha cyabo, ndetse bose abarimbura mu buryo bureshya (baba abakuru n’abato, abakire n’abakene, ndetse n’abakomeye n’abaciriritse).
